Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted WB: 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd; EB: 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Cottage Grove and 63rd due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, King Drive, 61st, Cottage Grove and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Delaware/Dewitt
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Delaware, Inner Lake Shore Dr, and Chestnut due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Delaware, Inner Lake Shore Dr, and Chestnut due to street blockage near Delaware/Dewitt.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
